newsitem.title: USA: NCR to provide data warehousing for Reuters.
newsitem.headline: NCR to provide data warehousing for Reuters.

text.p: NCR Inc on Monday said it has agreed on a $50.7 million contract with Reuters Holdings PLC to increase the size and capabilities of its data warehouse.
The computer maker will supply Reuters with five NCR WorldMark 5100M Massively Parallel Processing servers that will be integrated with its existing NCR systems.

The 5100M servers and the installed NCR 3600MPP machines -- running NCR's Teradata relational database management system and NCR TOP END enterprise middleware software -- will form a 500-gigabyte data warehouse valued at nearly $76 million.
NCR said its servers are to be installed in Reuters' data center in London. A second data center is under construction in Geneva to provide back up and load sharing.
